info.title: Patchman-engine API
info.description:
API of the Patch application on [console.redhat.com](https://console.redhat.com)

Syntax of the `filter[name]` query parameters is described in  [Filters documentation](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/patchman-engine/wiki/API-custom-filters)

get.summary: Show me all applicable advisories for all my systems
get.description: Show me all applicable advisories for all my systems

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

get.summary: Show me details an advisory by given advisory name
get.description: Show me details an advisory by given advisory name

get.summary: Show me systems on which the given advisory is applicable
get.description: Show me systems on which the given advisory is applicable

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

get.summary: Show me all baselines for all my systems
get.description: Show me all baselines for all my systems

put.summary: Create a baseline for my set of systems
put.description: Create a baseline for my set of systems. System cannot be satellite managed.

get.summary: Show baseline detail by given baseline ID
get.description: Show baseline detail by given baseline ID

put.summary: Update a baseline for my set of systems
put.description: Update a baseline for my set of systems. System cannot be satellite managed.

get.summary: Show me all systems belonging to a baseline
get.description: Show me all systems applicable to a baseline

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

get.summary: Export applicable advisories for all my systems
get.description: Export applicable advisories for all my systems. Export endpoints are not paginated.

get.summary: Export systems for my account
get.description: Export systems for my account. Export endpoints are not paginated.

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

get.description: Export systems applicable to a baseline. Export endpoints are not paginated.

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]

get.description: Show me all installed packages across my systems. Export endpoints are not paginated.

get.description: Show me all my systems which have a package installed. Export endpoints are not paginated.

post.summary: View advisory-system pairs for selected systems and installable advisories
post.description: View advisory-system pairs for selected systems and installable advisories

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

post.summary: View system-advisory pairs for selected systems and installable advisories
post.description: View system-advisory pairs for selected systems and installable advisories

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

advisory_type_name.description: Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)
Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)

to_time.description: Filter applicable advisories (updates) by the latest publish time.

systems.description: Count of the systems associated with the baseline

inventory_ids.description: List of inventory IDs to have baselines removed

has_systems.description: Show whether customer has some registered systems

subtotals.description: Some subtotals used by some endpoints

meta.description: Generic response fields (pagination params, filters etc.)

config.description: Baseline config to filter applicable advisories and package updates for the associated systems (optional).

inventory_ids.description: Inventory IDs list of systems to associate with this baseline (optional).

baseline_id.description: Updated baseline unique ID, it can not be changed
Updated baseline unique ID, it can not be changed

has_systems.description: Show whether customer has some registered systems

subtotals.description: Some subtotals used by some endpoints

advisory_type_name.description: Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)
Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)

systems.description: Count of the systems associated with the template
List of inventory IDs to have templates removed

has_systems.description: Show whether customer has some registered systems

subtotals.description: Some subtotals used by some endpoints

meta.description: Generic response fields (pagination params, filters etc.)

inventory_ids.description: Map of inventories to add to (true) or remove (false) from given baseline (optional)

baseline_id.description: Updated baseline unique ID, it can not be changed

epoch_required.description: VMaaS will check package_list and return error if we provide package_list without epochs

optimistic_updates.description: Search for updates of unknown package EVRAs.

third_party.description: Include content from \"third party\" repositories into the response, disabled by default.
